name: Marooned (itch) (acosta317)
description:
Try to survive being marooned in the Bermuda Triangle! Find enough parts of your ship to be able to sail away.

This game was created as a submission to the Indie Game Dev Beginners Game Jam November 2021, which lasted for 10 days.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • Move off the island and press space to search for things.
